Quest.PartScript:
-- // QT.XML
{"state", "iEpoch", "iEpochLast", "bTutEnabled", "bSandboxQuests", "bTutEnabled", "iYearEpoch1Start", "iYearEpoch2Start", "iYearEpoch3Start", "iYearEpoch4Start", "iYearEpoch5Start","iYearEpoch6Start", "iYearEpoch7Start", "b000000a2", "b12000004", "b12000005", "b12000007", "b12000009", "b23000003", "b23100001", "b23000002", "b23000004", "b23000005", "b23000006", "b23000009", "b23000011", "b34000001", "b34000002", "b34000003", "b34000004", "b34000005", "b34000006", "b34000007", "b34000009", "iXMLVersion", "iGameVersion", "sCSV_QuestOldState" }
iYearEpoch1Start = 20000 iYearEpoch2Start = 20000 iYearEpoch3Start = 20000 iYearEpoch4Start = 20000 iYearEpoch5Start = 20000 iYearEpoch6Start = 20000 iYearEpoch7Start = 20000
-- quests bool (quest once) b000000a2 = true -- borrow b12000001 = 1 -- pass delivery b12000004 = true -- num trains b12000005 = true -- numtrains b12000009 = true -- forest cut (event) b23000002 = true -- logsIn b23000003 = true -- onstart2 oreCoal b23000004 = true -- own depo upgrade b23000005 = true -- connect city b23000009 = true -- hard choice b23000011 = true -- church (event) b23100001 = true -- buy train b34000001 = true -- oil b34000002 = true -- goods b34000003 = true -- build rails b34000004 = true -- dontDelivery b34000005 = true -- delivery random b34000006 = true -- traveler b34000007 = true -- visit10cities b34000009 = true -- oil in
-- // ------------------------------------------------------------------ -- // ------------------------------------------------------------------
state = -1 iXMLVersion = -1 sCSV_QuestOldState = ""
function OnStart() iXMLVersion = 1 -- // set custom xml version ! DbgTextClear() -- // clear debug window
DbgText("clr -------------------- QT.XML id=00000000 OnStart() --------------------------------- ") state = 0
iGameVersion = GetGameVersion() -- // YYYYMMDD local iSaveVersion = GetSaveVersion() -- // int (24 atd.) DbgText(" ----- QT.XML | state: "..state.." | GameVer.:"..iGameVersion.." | SaveVersion: "..iSaveVersion.." |")
-- // start Tcash local tStartCash = { [0] = 500, [1] = 1000, [2] = 2000, [3] = 5000 } if not ( tStartCash[GetStartCash()] == nil ) then BorrowTokens( tStartCash[GetStartCash()] ) else BorrowTokens(23) DbgText(" ----- QT.XML | Tcash issue | GetStartCash() "..GetStartCash() ) end
-- // Set epoch + Quests local iStartingEpoch = GetEpoch() DbgText(" ----- QT.XML | iStartingEpoch "..iStartingEpoch )
-- SetYear ( GetStartYear(iStartingEpoch) ) -- // set year AddQuest( GetStartEraQuest(iStartingEpoch) ) -- // Choose milestone
if IsSandboxQuestEnabled() then AddQuest("17000000") -- // Vanila quest controller end
state = 1 return true end
function GetStartEraQuest(iStartEra) tEras = { [1] = "12000000", [2] = "23000000", [3] = "34000000", [4] = "45000000", [5] = "56000000", [6] = "67000000", [7] = "78000000"}
if (tEras[iStartEra] == nil) then return "12000000" --// some issue solve else return tEras[iStartEra] --// get quest hash from table end end
function GetStartYear(iStartEra) tYears = { [1] = "1920", [2] = "1930", [3] = "1940", [4] = "1950", [5] = "1960", [6] = "1970", [7] = "1980"}
if (tYears[iStartEra] == nil) then return "1920" --// some issue solve else return tYears[iStartEra] --// get year from table end end
function OnLoad() DbgTextClear() -- // clear debug window
local iSaveVersion = GetSaveVersion() --// int (24 atd.) DbgText(" ----------------------------- QT.XML OnLoad() --------------------------------- "..state.."\n - SaveVersion "..iSaveVersion) DbgText(" ----- QT.XML OnLoad() | iXMLVersion: "..iXMLVersion)
if ( iXMLVersion == nil or iXMLVersion < 1 ) then -- // old type of saves ? DbgText(" ------ QT.XML OnLoad() | ! OLD XML TYPE ! | -------------- ")
local iRemQCLua_Version = GetRemoteQuestVariable("17000000", "state") DbgText(" ------ QT.XML OnLoad() 17000000 iRemQCLua_Version: "..iRemQCLua_Version)
if (iRemQCLua_Version == "") then DbgText(" ------ QT.XML OnLoad() | GetOldValus + AddQuest : 17000000 ---- ")
GetOldValues() AddQuest("17000000")
else DbgText(" ------ QT.XML OnLoad() | ERR : 17000000 is already active ---- ") end
iXMLVersion = 1 -- // set custom xml version ! else DbgText(" ------ QT.XML new type, nothing to do ----- ") end
return true end
function GetOldValues() DbgText(" ------ QT.XML OnLoad() Trying restore old quest values ---")
local bSandboxQuests = IsSandboxQuestEnabled() local bTutEnabled = IsTutorialEnabled() local iYear = GetYear() local iMonth = GetMonth()
if (bSandboxQuests) then
if bTutEnabled then if (iYear >= 1920 and iMonth >= 8) then AddOldState("12000001","1") end if not b23000004 then AddOldState("23000004","1") end -- depo upgrade info (not a quest) else AddOldState("12000001","1") end
if (iYear >= 1921 and iMonth >= 5) then AddOldState("12000002","1") end -- 12 logs if (iYear >= 1926 and iMonth >= 5) then AddOldState("12000006","1") end -- 12 addon if ((iYear >= iYearEpoch2Start + 8) and (iMonth == 5)) then AddOldState("12000006","1") end -- --// false : already added! if not b12000004 then AddOldState("12000004","1") end -- 12 coal if not b12000005 then AddOldState("12000005","1") end -- 12 own train if not b12000009 then AddOldState("12000009","1") end -- 12 forest cut
if not b23000002 then AddOldState("23000002","1") end -- 23 logsin if not b23000003 then AddOldState("23000003","1") end -- 23 oreCoal (OnStart) ----- if not b23000005 then AddOldState("23000005","1") end -- 23 connect city if not b23000011 then AddOldState("23000011","1") end -- 23 church if not b23100001 then AddOldState("23100001","1") end -- 23 buy train
if not b34000001 then AddOldState("34000001","1") end -- delivery oil (OnStart) ----- if not b34000002 then AddOldState("34000002","1") end -- delivery goods if not b34000003 then AddOldState("34000003","1") end -- bul rail 12000007 if not b34000005 then AddOldState("34000005","1") end -- if not b34000006 then AddOldState("34000006","1") end -- if not b34000007 then AddOldState("34000007","1") end -- visit 10 cities
end
return true end
function AddOldState(sHash, sState) DbgText(" -------- QT.XML | AddOldState: "..sHash.." | ".. sState) sCSV_QuestOldState = sCSV_QuestOldState..sHash..","..sState.."," return sCSV_QuestOldState end
